bocados.title: Bocados Élite
bocados.description: Self-service kiosk with 3-step checkout flow. Dynamic cart and admin panel with real-time updates every 3 seconds.
bocados.imageAlt: Screenshot of Bocados Élite application showing the digital kiosk interface

guitar.title: Guitar Los Angeles
guitar.description: Online guitar store. The shopping cart makes it easy and convenient to add guitars to an order, modify selections and see the total price. It also offers a tips blog to help improve guitar playing skills.
guitar.imageAlt: Screenshot of Guitar Los Angeles online store showing the guitar catalog

barber.title: Barber Club
barber.description: Web application for booking appointments. It allows clients to register, choose a date and time, and select the services they want. After creating the appointment, the details and total cost are shown to the client. The application also allows clients to edit or delete appointments if necessary. Administrators can create, edit or delete services and view all appointments for the day in a single view or search for an appointment by date.
barber.imageAlt: Screenshot of Barber Club application showing the appointment booking system

trago.title: Trago Trax
trago.description: Website. It facilitates the search for exquisite drinks and cocktails through carefully selected category organization. Allowing you to find the perfect drink recipes that suit your individual preferences and needs.
trago.imageAlt: Screenshot of Trago Trax website showing the drinks and cocktails catalog

crm.title: Client Connect
crm.description: CRM with full CRUD functionality and direct HTTP connection to an API. It allows managing clients with ease, ensuring that records are not duplicated.
crm.imageAlt: Screenshot of Client Connect CRM showing the client management interface

layout.defaultDescription: Computer Systems Engineer specialized in web development. In recent years, my main focus has been Front-End product development. I am passionate about transforming ideas into solid and scalable digital experiences.

pelis-pulse.title: Pelis Pulse
pelis-pulse.description: Website that facilitates the search for movies classified by genres, such as adventure, horror, etc. For each movie, its cover, name and release date are shown.

crypto-check.title: Crypto Check
crypto-check.description: Web application that quotes in real time the price of the 20 Cryptocurrencies with the highest value or market capitalization. To use it, choose a currency and a cryptocurrency and click quote.

auto-seguro.title: Auto Insurance
auto-seguro.description: Web application. Simulates car insurance quotes, provides the opportunity to get a quote, considering various factors such as the age difference, your vehicle brand and the insurance plan you choose

bienes-raices.title: Real Estate
bienes-raices.description: Website with house sale ads, the user has the opportunity to request information about a property for sale or to publish an ad for their property for sale. The site also has a tips blog and a testimonials section. The administrator has full control over ads, sellers and posts.

weather-finder.title: Weather Now
weather-finder.description: Web application. Provides information about weather conditions in various locations.

plan-gastos.title: Expense Planner
plan-gastos.description: Web application that helps users track their expenses. It has the ability to add and edit expenses easily and the function to filter expenses by categories, plus a chart that updates automatically depending on the budget spent.

cafe-adicto.title: Coffee Addict
cafe-adicto.description: This website is a paradise for coffee lovers, where they can find everything they need to know about this wonderful world and immerse themselves in its colors, aromas and flavors.

healthy-pets.title: Healthy Pets
healthy-pets.description: Web application to track medical and health information of their clients' pets in an organized and easy way.

emfestival.title: EMFestival
emfestival.description: Landing Page with the purpose of providing information about the event. The first impression when entering the page is to transmit through a background video the emotion of living the experience of being present on the day of the event.
